title: How is an Oxford comma used incorrectly? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you’re asking how a comma can be used incorrectly. Go to OWL // Purdue Writing Lab for excellent instruction in punctuation. You may encounter people who rage about the Oxford comma - for or against. They don’t know what they’re talking about. The Oxford comma is a choice (like a preference for tea or coffee). Book publishers require it. Newspapers forbid it. If you’re writing for pay, you do what the company tells you to do. If you’re writing on your own, you make your own decision and stick to it. What pros don’t do is sneer at writers who’ve made the opposite choice.
